text: Acer undulatum is a species of maple,The Plant List, Acer undulatum Pojark. endemic to Babadağ near Fethiye in Muğla Province, southwestern Turkey, where it grows at altitudes of between 1,400 and 1,800 meters.Güner, A. 1998. IUCN Red List, Acer undulatum. Downloaded on 20 August 2007.Pojarkova, Antonina Ivanovna 1976. Novosti Sistematiki Vysshikh Rastenii [New Delhi] 13: 216 ==References== undulatum Category:Flora of Turkey Category:Near threatened plants Category:Plants described in 1976 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Acer undulatum
